mapper.select:
SELECT PMMTLYJCB_ID, PMMTLYJCB_DWMC, PMMTLYJCB_DWBH, PMMTLYJCB_DWID, PMMTLYJCB_BMMC, PMMTLYJCB_BMBH, PMMTLYJCB_BMID, PMMTLYJCB_TBR, PMMTLYJCB_TBRID, to_char(PMMTLYJCB_TBRQ,'yyyy/mm/dd')PMMTLYJCB_TBRQ, PMMTLYJCB_SPZT, PMMTLYJCB_WFID, PMMTLYJCB_HTBH, to_char(PMMTLYJCB_JCRQ,'yyyy/mm/dd')PMMTLYJCB_JCRQ, PMMTLYJCB_SGDW, PMMTLYJCB_FJHJ, PMMTLYJCB_GLDW, PMMTLYJCB_JCR, PMMTLYJCB_HTJE, PMMTLYJCB_BZ, PMMTLYJCB_HTMC, PMMTLYJCBMX_ID, PMMTLYJCBMX_MID, PMMTLYJCBMX_JCNR, PMMTLYJCBMX_FJ, PMMTLYJCBMX_MEMO, PMMTLYJCBMX_BH FROM sgdwlyjcb jh LEFT JOIN SGDWLYJCBMX mx ON mx.PMMTLYJCBMX_MID = PMMTLYJCB_ID
AND PMMTLYJCB_ID LIKE '%'||trim(#{id})||'%' AND PMMTLYJCB_HTMC LIKE '%'||trim(#{htmc})||'%' AND PMMTLYJCB_SPZT LIKE '%'||trim(#{spzt})||'%' AND to_date(to_char(PMMTLYJCB_TBRQ,'yyyy/mm/dd'),'yyyy/mm/dd')>to_date(#{ksrq},'yyyy/mm/dd') AND to_date(to_char(PMMTLYJCB_TBRQ,'yyyy/mm/dd'),'yyyy/mm/dd')<to_date(#{jsrq},'yyyy/mm/dd')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SGDWLYJCB(PMMTLYJCB_ID, PMMTLYJCB_DWMC, PMMTLYJCB_DWBH, PMMTLYJCB_DWID, PMMTLYJCB_BMMC, PMMTLYJCB_BMBH, PMMTLYJCB_BMID, PMMTLYJCB_TBR, PMMTLYJCB_TBRID, PMMTLYJCB_TBRQ, PMMTLYJCB_SPZT, PMMTLYJCB_WFID, PMMTLYJCB_HTBH, PMMTLYJCB_JCRQ, PMMTLYJCB_SGDW, PMMTLYJCB_FJHJ,PMMTLYJCB_GLDW, PMMTLYJCB_JCR, PMMTLYJCB_HTJE, PMMTLYJCB_BZ, PMMTLYJCB_HTMC) VALUES (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dwmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dwbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{bmmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{bmbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{bmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{tbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{tbrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, to_date(#{tbrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'yyyy/mm/dd'),#{spzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{wfid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{htbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},to_date(#{jcrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'yyyy/mm/dd'), #{sgdw,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{fjhj,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{gldw,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jcr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{htje,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,#{htmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

INSERT INTO SGDWLYJCBMX(PMMTLYJCBMX_ID, PMMTLYJCBMX_MID, PMMTLYJCBMX_JCNR, PMMTLYJCBMX_FJ, PMMTLYJCBMX_MEMO,PMMTLYJCBMX_BH)
SELECT sys_guid(), #{item.mid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.jcnr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.fj,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item.memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.bh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} FROM DUAL
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM sgdwlyjcbmx WHERE pmmtlyjcbmx_mid IN
#{id}

DELETE FROM sgdwlyjcb WHERE pmmtlyjcb_id IN
#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT PMMTLYJCBMX_ID id, PMMTLYJCBMX_MID mid, PMMTLYJCBMX_JCNR jcnr, PMMTLYJCBMX_FJ fj, PMMTLYJCBMX_MEMO memo, PMMTLYJCBMX_BH bh FROM sgdwlyjcbmx WHERE pmmtlyjcbmx_mid = #{id}

SELECT PMMTJCZBQKJCB_ID, PMMTJCZBQKJCB_DWMC, PMMTJCZBQKJCB_DWBH, PMMTJCZBQKJCB_DWID, PMMTJCZBQKJCB_BMMC, PMMTJCZBQKJCB_BMBH, PMMTJCZBQKJCB_BMID, PMMTJCZBQKJCB_TBR, PMMTJCZBQKJCB_TBRID, to_char(PMMTJCZBQKJCB_TBRQ,'yyyy/mm/dd')PMMTJCZBQKJCB_TBRQ, PMMTJCZBQKJCB_SPZT, PMMTJCZBQKJCB_WFID, PMMTJCZBQKJCB_HTBH, to_char(PMMTJCZBQKJCB_JCRQ,'yyyy/mm/dd')PMMTJCZBQKJCB_JCRQ, PMMTJCZBQKJCB_SGDW, PMMTJCZBQKJCB_XMMC, PMMTJCZBQKJCB_GLDW, PMMTJCZBQKJCB_HTJE, PMMTJCZBQKJCB_WYFJ, PMMTJCZBQKJCB_HTMC, PMMTJCZBQKJCB_BZ, PMMTJCZBQKJCB_JCR, PMMTJCZBQKJCBMX_ID, PMMTJCZBQKJCBMX_MID, PMMTJCZBQKJCBMX_JCNR, PMMTJCZBQKJCBMX_FJ, PMMTJCZBQKJCBMX_MEMO, PMMTJCZBQKJCBMX_BH FROM JCZBQKJCB jh LEFT JOIN JCZBQKJCBMX mx on mx.PMMTJCZBQKJCBMX_MID = jh.PMMTJCZBQKJCB_ID
AND PMMTJCZBQKJCB_ID LIKE '%'||trim(#{id})||'%' AND PMMTJCZBQKJCB_HTMC LIKE '%'||trim(#{htmc})||'%' AND PMMTJCZBQKJCB_SPZT LIKE '%'||trim(#{spzt})||'%' AND to_date(to_char(PMMTJCZBQKJCB_TBRQ,'yyyy/mm/dd'),'yyyy/mm/dd')>to_date(#{ksrq},'yyyy/mm/dd') AND to_date(to_char(PMMTJCZBQKJCB_TBRQ,'yyyy/mm/dd'),'yyyy/mm/dd')<to_date(#{jsrq},'yyyy/mm/dd')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO JCZBQKJCB(PMMTJCZBQKJCB_ID, PMMTJCZBQKJCB_DWMC, PMMTJCZBQKJCB_DWBH, PMMTJCZBQKJCB_DWID, PMMTJCZBQKJCB_BMMC, PMMTJCZBQKJCB_BMBH, PMMTJCZBQKJCB_BMID, PMMTJCZBQKJCB_TBR, PMMTJCZBQKJCB_TBRID, PMMTJCZBQKJCB_TBRQ, PMMTJCZBQKJCB_SPZT, PMMTJCZBQKJCB_WFID, PMMTJCZBQKJCB_HTBH, PMMTJCZBQKJCB_JCRQ, PMMTJCZBQKJCB_SGDW, PMMTJCZBQKJCB_XMMC, PMMTJCZBQKJCB_GLDW, PMMTJCZBQKJCB_HTJE, PMMTJCZBQKJCB_WYFJ, PMMTJCZBQKJCB_HTMC, PMMTJCZBQKJCB_BZ, PMMTJCZBQKJCB_JCR) VALUES (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dwmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dwbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bmmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bmbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tbrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, to_date(#{tbrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'yyyy/mm/dd'), #{spzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wfid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{htbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, to_date(#{jcrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'yyyy/mm/dd'), #{sgdw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xmmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gldw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{htje,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wyfj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{htmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jcr,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

INSERT INTO JCZBQKJCBMX(PMMTJCZBQKJCBMX_ID, PMMTJCZBQKJCBMX_MID, PMMTJCZBQKJCBMX_JCNR, PMMTJCZBQKJCBMX_FJ, PMMTJCZBQKJCBMX_MEMO, PMMTJCZBQKJCBMX_BH)
